attributes.action: Give Capt Tom Moore a Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: With Chancellor Rishi Sunak citing his actions as evidence “The British spirit is as strong as it has ever been” and Reegan Davies starting #makeacardfortom, his conduct has inspired us all. He has responded to Her Majesty’s call to demonstrate British virtues like  "self-discipline", "quiet, good-humoured resolve" and "fellow-feeling". Doing this to thank his supporters within the NHS and care system. This is what the Honours system ought to be for.
attributes.background: Give Capt Tom Moore a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
